thread.title: Jerry Lorenzo Teases Sporty New Fear of God “Basketball Sneaker”
thread.title_full: Jerry Lorenzo Teases Sporty New Fear of God “Basketball Sneaker”

author: Marcus Cho
title: Jerry Lorenzo Teases Sporty New Fear of God “Basketball Sneaker”
text:
Jerry Lorenzo’s “Military Sneaker” was his first-ever footwear silhouette, and was well-received within the luxury community as its rugged aesthetics filled a niche that desperately needed more. Now, the Fear of God designer has debuted his second sneaker in form of the simply named “Basketball Sneaker.”
The silhouette seems to take after the classic Nike Dunk/Jordan 1 model, as perforations on the toebox and premium leather upper are shaped similarly. On the contrary however, a chunky midsole and rugged outsole offer a tougher feel, while the look is wrapped up with contrasting tones of black and white all over.
The sneakers look to be part of Fear of God’s upcoming fifth collection; stay tuned for further updates concerning the “Basketball Sneaker.”
🇫🇷 leaving the @vetements_official show… vetements hooded bomber x @fearofgod fitted x bball tank and #fifthcollection basketball sneakers… 📸 @bleumode
